content:
Check:
  any:
    - all:
        - name: define_dataset_class
          operator: str_equal_to
          value: TRIAL DESIGN
        - name: define_dataset_name
          operator: is_not_contained_by
          value:
            - TA
            - TD
            - TE
            - TI
            - TM
            - TS
            - TV
    - all:
        - name: define_dataset_class
          operator: str_equal_to
          value: SPECIAL-PURPOSE
        - name: define_dataset_name
          operator: is_not_contained_by
          value:
            - CO
            - DM
            - SE
            - SM
            - SV
    - all:
        - name: define_dataset_class
          operator: str_equal_to
          value: INTERVENTIONS
        - name: define_dataset_name
          operator: is_not_contained_by
          value:
            - AG
            - CM
            - EC
            - EX
            - ML
            - PR
            - SU
    - all:
        - name: define_dataset_class
          operator: str_equal_to
          value: EVENTS
        - name: define_dataset_name
          operator: is_not_contained_by
          value:
            - AE
            - BE
            - CE
            - DS
            - DV
            - HO
            - MH
    - all:
        - name: define_dataset_class
          operator: str_equal_to
          value: FINDINGS
        - name: define_dataset_name
          operator: is_not_contained_by
          value:
            - BS
            - CP
            - CV
            - DA
            - DD
            - EG
            - FT
            - GF
            - IE
            - IS
            - LB
            - MB
            - MI
            - MK
            - MS
            - NV
            - OE
            - PC
            - PE
            - PP
            - QS
            - RE
            - RP
            - RS
            - SC
            - SS
            - TR
            - TU
            - UR
            - VS
    - all:
        - name: define_dataset_class
          operator: str_equal_to
          value: FINDINGS ABOUT
        - name: define_dataset_name
          operator: is_not_contained_by
          value:
            - FA
            - SR
    - all:
        - all:
            - name: define_dataset_class
              operator: str_equal_to
              value: RELATIONSHIP
        - any:
            - name: define_dataset_name
              operator: is_not_contained_by
              value:
                - RELREC
                - RELSPEC
                - RELSUB
                - SUPPQUAL
            - name: define_dataset_name
              operator: starts_with
              value: SUPP
    - all:
        - name: define_dataset_class
          operator: str_equal_to
          value: STUDY REFERENCE
        - name: define_dataset_name
          operator: is_not_contained_by
          value:
            - OI
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0312
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when custom domains use the reserved or modelled standard
  names
Outcome:
  Message: Custom domains use the reserved or modelled standard names.
Rule Type: Dataset Metadata Check against Define XML
Sensitivity: Domain
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0312
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: "'A custom domain may only be created if the data\
                  \ are different in nature and do not fit into an existing published\
                  \ domain.'"
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: NA
                Section: '2.6'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when custom domains use the reserved or modelled standard names

Outcome.Message: Custom domains use the reserved or modelled standard names.

json.Rule_Type: Dataset Metadata Check against Define XML

Citations.Cited_Guidance: 'A custom domain may only be created if the data are different in nature and do not fit into an existing published domain.'
